projects.title: Applify: Minimalist job application tracker
projects.description:
Entire application with 15+ AWS resources deployable using AWS CloudFormation 
 Dockerized both front-end and back-end for High availability deployment using Kubernetes and Terraform 
 Backend supports 2 architectures: serverless and serverful architecture for flexibility

projects.title: Do-It! Household chores manager
projects.description:
Implemented multi-user management to track each userâ€™s progress on a shared dashboard 
 Used OAuth 2.0 and refresh tokens for better user experience 
 Developed more than 7 REST api methods to handle CRUD operations and actions between front-end and back-end 
 Implemented reminders notifications using AWS SNS(Simple Notification System)
